We were contacted by Nitzan with the fact that the site of the client uniquesandantiques.com went down. We raised the morning Backup on another server and switched DNS to it. After we raised other clients that were on the server. The server went down due to internet connection problems with the hosting provider.

К нам обратился Nitzan с тем что сайт клиента uniquesandantiques.com упал. Мы подняли утренний Backup на другом сервере и переключили на него DNS. После мы подняли других клиентов которые были на сервере. Сервер упал по причине проблем соединения с интернетом хостинг провайдера.

A payment method is required in order to be approved to bid in this auction
Please wait for the auction house to process your approval request
A payment method is required to participate in this auction
need payment method to participate
payment method to participate
You need a payment method to participate in this auction
true if users need to request approval for this auction specifically
true if users need to provide a payment method in order to get approved for this auction

Some auction houses require the user to request an approval for each auction specifically. This is determined by the approvalRequired field of an auctionInfo object. In addition, an auction house may require the user to provide a payment method in order to participate in the auction. This is determined by the paymentMethodRequired field. see “Working with payment methods” for information on how to handle payment methods in the system. To request participation in an auction use the approvalsrequestToParticipateInAuction api. to check if the user is approved use the approvalsgetAuctionApprovalState api.
